title: Chase Center - Wikipedia
snippet: The arena also includes the Warriors’ practice facility known as the Oracle Performance Center. The Chase Center is the second youngest arena in the NBA, after the Intuit Dome in Inglewood, California. title: Home | Chase Center
snippet: Chase Center, a state-of-the-art sports and entertainment arena in San Francisco, is home to the Golden State Warriors and nearly 200 events per year.
